name: Responsive
description:
Preview your responsive designs inside Figma!


How to

  • Add all your layout frames part of a responsive design
  • Add a frame to use as a responsive preview screen
  • Start resizing the preview screen and see how your design behaves
  • Click on the input frames in the plugin to test all edge cases


Demo

https://twitter.com/eminsinani/status/1263883853283950592


Notes

  • The preview screen changes frames based on the width of the input frames
  • The width of an input frame is used as the minimum size for that layout
